definitions.title: vb. be quiet, at ease
definitions.body: (Sir 47:13 [[שלוה]] prosperity, Sir 41:1c [[שליו]] prosperous, at ease; 4lo0 be tranquil, quiet, ceaee; Targum [[שְׁלָא]], [[שְׁלי]] be at ease, then be careless, thoughtless, go astray [for Heb. [[שָׁגׇה]], [[שָׁגַג]]] Aph. neglect (God, etc.), BAram. Targum [[שָׁלוּ]] error; Ar sala0 (w) be. forgetful, neglectful, content, free (fr. anxiety));—
be at ease, prosper, of wicked, 3 pl. [[שָׁלוּ]] Je 12:1, La 1:5, also Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִשְׁלָ֫יוּ]] (Ges.§ 75 u) Job 12:5, and (of good) Ps 122:6 ([[יֵ֫שֶׁל]] Job 27:8 v. II. [[שׁלח]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 mpl. [[תִּשָּׁלוּ]] juss. 2Ch 29:11 be not negligent (easy-going; Germ. ‘bequem’).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[תַּשְׁלֶה]] juss. 2Ki 4:28 do not mislead me (cf. [[תְּכַזֵּב]] v:2Ki 4:16), strong Aramaism, whence Klo [[תַּשְׁגֶּה]].
